title: For some reason URF is missing
body:
Not sure how it happened, because RIOT finally got it's proverbial head out of it's metaphorical ass, and URF mode (the only thing worth playing) was working, as intended, last weekend.   For some reason it's not anymore.

Obviously a bug because even RIOT is not so foolish.   Please fix immediately.

replies.body: Not a bug, it's in the Rotating Game Mode queue was only intended to be on for the weekend. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=XnN44vFf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-27T22:12:25.242+0000)
>
> Not a bug, it's in the Rotating Game Mode queue was only intended to be on for the weekend. :)

Why dont you guys replace dominion with urf? ^^

Because people get bored of the same thing over and over. I don't know about you, but I got burnt out on URF this weekend. D: Rather than that happening, we're making multiple modes available to keep things fresh! :D

When more modes become available, why don't you guys just make it a daily thing? Similar to Smite, where there's a unique game mode of the day that changes at 2a PST. It'd keep rotational mode fresh, and give players something different to enjoy every day, while also giving players a chance to play another they may have missed out on previously due to busy life.
I don't think we'd want to copy this 100%, but I think this could be a good idea. It's something we could discuss! ^-^

Don't wanna sound mean but, may be getting way ahead of yourselves before a daily queue thing. 
Smite does daily rotating things that are like Urf mode, and their version of dominion, but most of their other modes are just " heres aram without healing heros" "heres the new champion in one forall so enjoy playing him/her" 
although i'd love a daily thing where oneforall where everyone was forced to use the new champ could be fun.

still waiting on the regular gamemode but you start with 100k gold instead of 500.

> although i'd love a daily thing where oneforall where everyone was forced to use the new champ could be fun.

That's a sweet idea, honestly. Could be a fun way to introduce everyone to new content.

LATE GAME SIMULATOR?! :D

Those full build level 1 all ins will be exciting.

And dominated by adcs.
Well then shouldnt you delete ARAM aswell as Dominion?
I don't see how that follows.

the late game simulator would have to be on the acension map, or ARAM.  Hi-rez tried the start with 100k gold and it was viewed as the worst gamemode they've ever done. 
an even better one is starting at level 18 with 50k gold from minute one. it would be insane. (although rip old poppy on that mode)
If you're trying to be funny...you're not.  If you're serious, then read what Riot puts out all the time about upcoming modes.
